algorithms.imageProcessing

Class SegmentedImageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.SegmentedImageHelper

  • public class SegmentedImageHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    a class to maintain the segmented images used by the blob scale finder. it holds methods to perform the segmentation and also methods to extract blobs and their borders.
    Author:
    nichole

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SegmentedImageHelper.SegmentationType
      BINARY = KMPP for k=2 followed by adaptive mean thresholding (scl=20/binFactor); GREYSCALE_KMPP = KMPP for k=2; COLOR_POLARCIEXY_ADAPT = color to greyscale using polar theta of CIEXY scale space followed by adaptive mean thresholding (scl=4?); COLOR_POLARCIEXY = color to greyscale using polar theta of CIEXY.
